page.title: 18WILMINGTON - LIFESTYLE 2
page.content: The Common, a triangle of land surrounded by trees, provides a setting for many village functions including the Mayfair organised by a local school The original aim of this being to bring the schools and the village together as a community. Remarks from people interviewed:- A poor place to live, no changes, more shops, facilities and amenities needed, plenty of places easy to get to At the Post Office, Barn End Lane, people were interviewed regarding the traffic. Was it busy? Which day was busiest? How could pedestrians be helped in the area? During one hour on a weekday the following conclusions were made:- The traffic was moderate; Constant flow of cars,occasional vans and lorries, one bus. The one sensible sugestion made was for a pedestrian crossing at some point.
